Cut Stocktaking Time by More than 50%

Take inventory on your smartphone; it’s saved to the cloud automatically, so there’s no data entry afterwards.

Smartphone Based Workflow

  • Unique easy-to-use user interface
  • Improve accuracy
  • Eliminate human errors
  • Works in offline places, like basements and cellars
  • One tap flashlight activation to count bottles in dark places
  • List your products under Areas, Sections such as Main Bar, Storage Room, etc.

Go Paperless with Our Cloud-Based Approach

  • All data is automatically synced to the cloud
  • Split up the work; multiple devices can be used at once
  • No need to manually tally up numbers, or enter data one-by-one
  • Save inventory reports straight from the app
  • Reset stock levels with one tap to start a stocktake from scratch
  • Give different access levels to your employees
  • Manage multiple venues from a single place

Live – Stock Sheets

  • See changes in real-time during stocktakes
  • Detailed product based stock information
  • Overview of your current stock value broken down by categories
  • Smart warnings on low volume products based on par levels
  • Stock levels can be reset when you wish to count from scratch

Stay Organized

  • Save unlimited reports and access them from anywhere at any time
  • Export them as Excel sheets so you can use them the way you want
  • Share your reports with other users
  • Saved and stored safely on the cloud
